author: chirino
msg: In the queue case, when a consumer was closed it was not properly re-delivering messages to other available consumers.  This was causing message to look like they got dropped.
- When we shut a queue sub down we now get it's pending+dispatched list and re-dispatch that to the other available subscriptions.
